00033 public class ElapsedTime 
00034 {
00039     public ElapsedTime() 
00040     {
00041     }
00042 
00046     public static long systemTime() 
00047     {
00048         long time = System.nanoTime();
00049         return time;
00050     }
00051 
00061     public static double calcElapsed(long start, long end) 
00062     {
00063         double elapsed = (end - start) / 1.0e+9;
00064         return elapsed;
00065     }
00066 
00078     public static String calcElapsedHMS(long start, long end) 
00079     {
00080         String s = "";
00081         double elapsed = (end - start) / 1.0e+9;
00082         s = s + calcHMS((int) Math.round(elapsed));
00083         return s;
00084     }
00085 
00095     public static String calcHMS(int timeInSeconds) 
00096     {
00097         String s = "";
00098 
00099         int hours, minutes, seconds;
00100         hours = timeInSeconds / 3600;
00101         timeInSeconds = timeInSeconds - (hours * 3600);
00102         minutes = timeInSeconds / 60;
00103         timeInSeconds = timeInSeconds - (minutes * 60);
00104         seconds = timeInSeconds;       
00105         s = s + hours + "h " + minutes + "m " + seconds + "s";
00106 
00107         return s;
00108     }
00109 
00110     
00117     public static void doPause(int timeInSeconds) 
00118     {
00119         long t0, t1;
00120 
00121         t0 = System.currentTimeMillis();
00122         t1 = System.currentTimeMillis() + (timeInSeconds * 1000);
00123 
00124         do 
00125         {
00126             t0 = System.currentTimeMillis();
00127         } while (t0 < t1);
00128     }
00129 }
